divs: Sighting DetailsSighting Report: I was paintballing in a forest on June 6 it was a clear night at somewhat 2200hrs with some friends when my squad and i heard a loud buzz ne of my buddies wisperedto lok at my left i look at him and his eyes wer fixed on some thing i looked and i saw a tall thin gray humanoid with eyes as wide as dinner plates and a large elongated head i tapped the second man in my squad to call the attention of the rest of the squad i gave hand signals to open fire on my command i couldnt think of any thing else to do i waited at least 5 seconds before yelling open fire and we sprayed it with paintballs it turned only to meet at least 50 rounds to its face and hundreds more to the rest of its body we stopped when we wasted our ammunition to my surprise it was still standing and then dropped but i thought we killed it we carefully stepped toward it guns locked loaded and leveled met the opposing squad who wanted to know what we were shooting at i nudgedit with the barrel of my assault rifle (Ariakon SIM4 with a M16A2 Barrel attachment)all of the sudden it disintegrated into a bluish mist ever since i have been seeing a strange orange ball of light over that area
trends: There have been 97 other sightings in Miami
There were no other sightings in Miami on or around June 14th 2005
